item.title: EP 517 - Did The U.S. Hunt Cryptids In Vietnam?
item.itunes:title: Did The U.S. Hunt Cryptids In Vietnam?
item.description:
Today we play one on two with the NBA pros and then we look into ghosts from Vietnam!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Links:

Did Marcus Morris Sub in for His Twin Brother, Markieff?

https://www.theringer.com/2017/5/3/16038328/2017-nba-playoffs-markieff-marcus-morris-twins-conspiracy-corner-ea07a7499f8c

 

2017 NBA Eastern Conference Semifinals

Wizards vs. Celtics

https://www.basketball-reference.com/playoffs/2017-nba-eastern-conference-semifinals-wizards-vs-celtics.html

 

Markieff Morris' twin brother, Marcus, denies conspiracy theory they switched places for Wizards-Celtics Game 2

https://www.nbcsports.com/washington/washington-wizards/markieff-morris-twin-brother-marcus-denies-conspiracy-theory-they-switched-places

 

Post #275, 30 Jan. 2018

PFC Gerald Lawrence Fox, U. S. Army, 1967

http://notredameclassof1969blog.blogspot.com/2018/01/a-vietnam-war-ghost-story-by-69-domer.html

 

BATTLE SUMMARY - July 12, 1967 Bravo Company

http://www.redwarriors.us/_BattleRpt_July12-67/BATTLE%20SUMMARY.pdf

 

Ghosts in Vietnamese culture

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ghosts_in_Vietnamese_culture

 

4 Creepy Ghost Stories From the Vietnam War

https://www.military.com/undertheradar/2019/03/08/4-creepy-ghost-stories-vietnam-war.html

 

Operation Wandering Soul (Vietnam War)

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Operation_Wandering_Soul_(Vietnam_War)

 

Montagnard (Vietnam)

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Montagnard_(Vietnam)#:~:text=The%20Montagnard%20are%20indigenous%20peoples,French%20protectorate%20period%20in%20Vietnam.

 

Agent Orange

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Agent_Orange#CITEREFVerwey1977

 

Napalm

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Napalm

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

 

Logo Art By Ash Black

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

Dead Rabbit Archivist Some Weirdo On Twitter AKA Jack

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
